## Overview ðŸ“š

This syllabus outlines the **Data Analysis Toolkit for Food and Nutrition Sciences** for MSc students. It includes 27 Jupyter notebooks across six modules, rendered as HTML tutorials in `_site/notebooks/`. Hippo-themed datasets (ðŸ¦›) teach practical data analysis skills.

**Note**: The `_site/` directory contains outdated HTMLs. Delete `_site/` and run `quarto render` to generate fresh tutorials.

## ðŸš€ Setup Instructions

1. **Clone the Repository**:
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/ggkuhnle/data-analysis-toolkit-FNS.git
   ```
2. **Install Dependencies**:
   ```bash
   pip install -r requirements.txt
   ```
   Install Quarto: [quarto.org](https://quarto.org).
3. **Run Notebooks**:
   ```bash
   jupyter notebook notebooks/01_infrastructure/0_getting_started.ipynb
   ```
4. **Render the Site**:
   ```bash
   rm -rf _site/
   quarto render
   ```
